000 LOAD -M(101); JUMP+M(009, R)
001 LOAD M(101); DIV(104)
002 SUB M(103); JUMP+M(007, L)
003 LOAD M(101); RSH
004 STOR M(101); LOAD MQ, M(100)
005 MUL M(100); LOAD MQ
006 STOR M(100); JUMP(000, L)
007 LOAD MQ, M(100); MUL M(102)
008 LOAD MQ; STOR M(102)
009 JUMP M(003, L); JUMP(009, R)

000 0210110009
001 011010C104
002 061030F007
003 0110115000
004 2110109100
005 0B1000A000
006 211000D000
007 091000B102
008 0A00021102
009 0D0030E009

100 000000003 #x
101 000000004 #n
102 000000001 #result
103 000000001 #constante
104 000000002 #constante
